info.title: Production Routing
info.description: A routing is a description of the operations (or steps in a process) that are performed to manufacture a product (or material). It is used as a reference for production orders, to run schedules and in calculating the costs of products.

x-sap-shortText: Read, update and create production routing information using this synchronous inbound service
